result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Illegal Shining of Deer, Elk, or Bear

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. LLOYD E SCHOONOVER

records.addlTxt: Status hearing on November 15, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

NOT ON THE RECORD 

Defendant LLOYD E SCHOONOVER in court.  Attorney Kirk William Everson in court for LLOYD E SCHOONOVER.  Attorney Matt McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Everson states he has received an offer and the offer has been provided to the defendant and no resolution at this time and requests another hearing. Court sets for Status Hearing November 15, 2022 at 3:30 PM.
Motion for Discovery - Defendant's
Notice of Appointment (of Atty Kirk Everson for defendant)
Return date on October 3, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Letter to the defendant dated 07/14/2022 re: Court appoints Atty Kirk Everson. The issue of reimbursement will addressed upon conclusion of the case.
on Petition for Appointment of an Attorney (Atty Kirk Everson)

NOT ON THE RECORD 

Defendant LLOYD E SCHOONOVER in court.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Court asks Atty Kirk Everson to meet with the defendant and his brother to see if he would want to take the cases as a court appointment. Atty Everson makes statement - both defendant are willing to sign a waiver but a conflict may or may not come up at some time in the cases. Court will appoint Atty Kirk Everson. Court sets for Return Date on October 3, 2022 at 10:30 AM. Court informs the defendants to stay in touch with Atty Everson.
Status hearing on July 12, 2022 at 08:45 am.

10:24 AM Defendant LLOYD E SCHOONOVER in court.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant states he does not qualify for PD representation. Statement by the Court - question if he does or does not qualify. Court will appoint a court appointed attorney.

Court adjourned at 10:15 AM

10:50 AM Defendant LLOYD E SCHOONOVER in court.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant states he met with Atty Kapelis and he qualifies. Court will set for Status of Counsel on June 21, 2022 at 10:00 AM.

Court adjourned at 10:51 AM
Second appearance scheduled for June 21, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Second appearance on June 21, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Second appearance on May 24, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Def called and stated he and his brother missed their court dates this week. Def stated he looked at the notice of hearing wrong and thought it was a different date. I confirmed def's address and phone number and gave them a court date of May 24, 2022 at 10:00 AM. I did ask to speak to the def's brother to verify he was aware of the court date. Contact was made and def's brother stated he'd also be able to make the new court date. Defendants stated they were still in the process of seeking counsel and believed they qualified for the public defender.
Warrant letter dated May 3, 2022                (def to respond by May 19, 2022)

12:08 PM Defendant JOHN W SCHOONOVER Jr. not in court.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls 22CM26 and 22CM25. Court orders a warrant - stayed for two week.

Court adjourned at 12:09 AM.

10:11 AM Defendant LLOYD E SCHOONOVER in court.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant states he is still looking into getting an attorney and is applying for the public defender. Statement by DA Laspisa.

Court adjourned at 10;12 AM.

Court sets Status of Counsel May 3, 2022 at 11:30 AM.
Second appearance scheduled for May 3, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Second appearance on May 3, 2022 at 11:30 am.

NOT ON THE RECORD 

Defendant LLOYD E SCHOONOVER in court.  Attorney Matt McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant states he is trying to get an attorney. Court sets for Status of counsel on April 5, 2022 at 10:00 AM.
Second appearance scheduled for April 5, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Second appearance on April 5, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Correct DOB
Second appearance on March 23, 2022 at 09:00 am.
**PROCESSING COMPLETE**
Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.
Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

9:23 AM Defendant LLOYD E SCHOONOVER appeared in court, Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa appeared in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and requests reading. Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count. Court finds probable cause. Court instructs the defendant of his/her right to an attorney. Court determines the def stands mute and enters a plea of NOT GUILTY on behalf of the def. Court also enters NOT GUILTY pleas for the FO cases. DA makes bond recommendation. Court sets bond at $500 signature bond and conditions of: Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.  Court will set for Status of Counsel on March 23, 2022 at 9:00 AM.

Court adjourned at 9:25 AM.
**PROCESSING NEEDED**
